simulator.framework.faultmodels

Class DropMessagesFaultModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.framework.Logger
      • simulator.framework.faultmodels.DropMessagesFaultModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkFaultModel

    public class DropMessagesFaultModel
extends Logger
implements NetworkFaultModel
    This fault model drops the specified percentage of messages, but never two consecutive messages with the same type.

      • DropMessagesFaultModel

        public DropMessagesFaultModel(double dropPercentage)
        Parameters:
        dropPercentage - A value in the range [0,100] that indicates how many messages should be dropped.

    • Method Detail

      • registerNetworkScheduler

        public void registerNetworkScheduler(NetworkScheduler ns)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkFaultModel
        Give the fault model a reference to the network scheduler. This allows it to call the fault interface methods, such as isMessagePending and dropCurrentMessage.
        Specified by:
        registerNetworkScheduler in interface NetworkFaultModel
        Parameters:
        ns - The network scheduler this fault model is registered with.
